name: Chiki-Chiki Boxy Racers
summary: Drift like a pro with easy analog stick controls! The intuitive party battle mode offers fun for everyone. Play wherever you are, any time! A mode with separate steering and accelerating/braking controls is also available. Compete with up to 8 players in multiplayer mode! - Shared Play using only Joy-Con controllers. - Local Multiplayer with each user playing on their own Nintendo Switch. - Online Multiplayer where you compete against global opponents. - Each mode can be played with 2-8 players. - Race Mode - There are four race tracks for each of the city, jungle and beach areas, making a total of 12 tracks! Win races to unlock new vehicles. There are 20 amazing vehicles to unlock, each with different features! - Party Battle Mode - You'll be spoilt for choice with four party game modes! - COINS - Collect coins that appear on the stage. Try for the jackpot playing the slots! - SMASH - Smash into opponents and push them off the stage. Drop 5 times and you're out! - PAINT - Paint the stage, claiming your turf. The player with the biggest turf wins! - GOAL - Get the ball into the opposing team's goal to score. Good teamplay is key to winning!
